Normal Tag only Indoor C-Mode Caution! You have made changes. Do you want to upload instead of discarding them? Upload Discard & download Back (don\'t do anything) Could not upload Some or all the data was not uploaded. Try again later. The API responded with an error, please save your data and report the issue:\n\n Upload conflict %1$s \nhas local version %2$d \nand the server %3$d %1$s \nhas local version %2$d \nand was deleted on the server %1$s \nwas deleted locally \nbut has references on the server %1$s \nwas already deleted on the server Use local version Use version on server Could not authenticate If you are using OAuth this is likely a bug, please send a problem report, if you are using login and password (not recommended), please check that they are entered correctly. No connection to server Could not connect to the OSM server now. Please check that you are connected to the Internet, or try again later. Could not connect to the OSM server because HTTPS negotiation failed. Try switching to a non-encrypted connection in the API preferences. Could not authenticate If you are using OAuth, re-authenticate and try again. If you are using login and password (not recommended), please check that they are entered correctly. Re-authenticate Login forbidden Go to openstreetmap.org Version conflict Data from download conflicts with your edits. Please upload your data before trying again. Invalid bounding box The selected area does not conform to API restrictions, please choose a different one. Download area too large The area you are trying to download is too large or contains too much data.\n\nPlease zoom in farther and try again. API offline The API is currently offline, no data can be retrieved or written. Out of memory Vespucci could not load the requested data. Please start again and load a smaller area. Vespucci could not load the requested data. Please save your edits, start again, and load a smaller area. Invalid data received If the error is not on your behalf, please file a bug report. Invalid data sent If the error is not on your behalf, please file a bug report. Could not write to file Vespucci could not change or save the file. Welcome Thank you for installing Vespucci.\n\nTo get started you need to know three things:\n
  • tapping the lock icon in the upper left corner will switch between locked (no editing) and unlocked mode,
  • to edit OpenStreetMap you need to download the data for the area where you want to change something first (zoom in before attempting that),
  • to add a new object: tap the large green button and select what you want to add, then tap the position you want to locate it at.
    • \nYou are all set to go now. Start mapping and have fun! \n\nYour device has \"soft keys\" that are hidden from view. Swipe from the bottom to show them again. Read the introduction This is a new Vespucci version New features and behaviour are detailed in the release notes. Your unsaved changes will be discarded if you proceed. Discard & proceed Imagery offset Description No offsets found in 10km radius! Author Offset Created Zoom Distance Z %1$d offset %2$s/%3$s Geodetic datum WGS84 Name suggestion This suggestion can replace some tag values with more popular ones. Search results Search online Enter search string with in view Preset search string Auto-preset Search No valid preset! Open Save to Existing GPX track data You already have existing GPX track data. You may want to cancel and save first. Really delete all tags for \"%1$s\" object? Element info ID Nodes Relation membership Problem Members Closed Version Length (m) Not downloaded Empty role Element Last updated Last edited Original Current GeoJSON feature info Copy properties Error Warning Minor issue Unknown error level This operation affects filtered attached objects! The changed object is connected to hidden elements that will change with it. OK, keep showing OK, discard Send debug info Evaluate Live mode! Debug mode! Validator ruleset %1$s Edit re-survey entry Add re-survey entry Edit check entry Add check entry Max. age Age Require\noptional Require optional Add re-survey entry Add check entry Empty relation The %1$s relation has no members.\n\nLeaving it as is will make it non-editable in Vespucci. Add members Leave empty GPX waypoint WPT: %1$s Description Created Altitude Create OSM object Create OSM object from preset search Custom imagery OAM imagery Edit layer entry Add layer entry Overlay Coverage Top Left Right Bottom Preferred Invalid or incomplete bounding box Delete layer? Layer style Stroke width Colour Label JSON object (not displayed) JSON array (not displayed) GeoJSON Grid GPX Photos Tasks OSM data Flush tile cache Change style Select imagery Checkpoints Undo - redo Just selected checkpoint (unsafe) Undo all later checkpoints (safe) Redo all earlier checkpoints (safe) Send with your OpenStreetMap display name OpenStreetMap display name not retrieved yet Feedback for the developers Download OpenStreetMap data + - 1 Vespucci Default Vespucci channel Vespucci QA Vespucci QA alert channel Pick a name Enter a URL Set minimum zoom lower than maximum You have not changed anything yet… Upload your unsaved changes first. Clear anyway? Uploaded to OSM server. Please zoom in to edit (Volume ↑/↓ or lens/shift) Unlock to edit Saved Could not save Please zoom in to add a note (Volume ↑/↓ Could not export Exported to %1$s Note - preset overwrote tag(s) Note - operation overwrote tag(s) You reversed a oneway street or a way with directionally dependent tags. Please check the tags and correct them if needed. You merged elements with conflicting tag values, direction dependent semantics or different roles in the same relation. Please check the tags and roles and correct them if needed. You are trying to merge elements with conflicting tag values.\n\nPlease check the tags and correct them before trying again. Unreadable or corrupt state file Too many nodes in way to move You have an unread OSM message You have %1$d unread OSM messages Read Started scan for geo-referenced photos Finished scan for geo-referenced photos Download failed with error code %1$d, message %2$s Unsurveyed road Road lacks name or ref Relation lacks type Try uploading again after allowing OAuth access to your OSM account. Please allow OAuth access to your OSM account. No OAuth configuration available for current API, please set login and password. OAuth is not enabled for the current API. Timeout during authentication handshake, please try again. Communication error during authentication handshake, please try again. Could not carry out OAuth handshake: %1$s Login with Google currently unsupported Timeout from server Longitude must be within -180°/+180°, latitude within -85°/85° Nothing found Could not save current state!\nThis a fatal error, trying to write an export file for later recovery with JOSM. Please install a file manager. Download more data to edit this area. %1$s not found. Imported %1$d GPX track points and 1 way point. Imported %1$d GPX track points and %2$d way points. Sorry, currently \"%1$s\" is not understood Inconsistent state detected, please send in the error report. Could not start camera app: %1$s No voice recognition facility present %1$s is not writeable by Vespucci.\nThis may be insufficient permissions or a technical issue with your device. The system did not return a suitable location for the tile database. At least one preset has to be selected! At least one geocoder has to be selected! Corrupted state file, used backup file instead. Corrupted bug state file, used backup file instead. Empty relation, creating crash report. Splitted \"from\" way Splitted \"via\" way Splitted \"from\" and \"via\" ways Splitted \"to\" way Tile database issue Serious issue with map tile database\n"%1$s"\nPlease consult our FAQ at https://vespucci.io/ Invalid API URL Invalid ReadOnly API URL Invalid notes API URL Invalid preset URL Invalid regular expression in filter with key="%1$s" value="%2$s" Can\'t access %1$s photo Voice recognition facility missing %1$s has no coverage here %1$s file exists. Object may be out of date %1$s key missing Invalid opening hours value for %1$s Opening hours value for %1$s autocorrected Double tap an empty space or use the ← arrow to exit Use the ← arrow to save and exit Use the ← arrow to abort Please do not add elements at 0°/0° (Null Island) String too long (%1$d characters), truncated! Illegal operation: %1$s Could not create the preset "%1$s": %2$s Missing imperial units Could not connect to server: %1$s This will flush all tile caches! Image offset applied. Unsupported format: %1$s Returning %1$d of %2$d found entries Not a MBTiles format file Using network location Using positioning location Positioning turned off, GPX tracking stopped Tags copied to clipboard Tags cut to clipboard Properties copied to clipboard %1$s has changed on the server, upload first and then re-download Only new Notes can be moved Task layer disabled Unable to create task layer Yes No OK Cancel Dismiss Done Locked Next Apply Set Replace Save Save and set Back Forward Keep Enable Disable Clear Discard Retry Read Overwrite Share Share position Share on OpenStreetMap Min. Max. %1$s (%2$s) None Exit Vespucci Are you sure you want to exit? Are you sure you want to pause tracking and exit? key Key value Value Values (%1$d) Values (for %1$d elements) http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/index.php/Map_Features Add address tags Surveyed Presets Apply best preset Repeat tags Revert Map feature wiki Add to relation Reset presets Reset address prediction Exit\nwithout saving Delete non-associated tags Scroll to top Scroll to bottom Type value Type or tap for values Type or tap for name suggestions Tap to edit Multiple values Tap for values Tag(s) selected Member(s) selected Relation(s) selected Additional properties Details Not set Move up Move to top Move down Move to bottom Sort Reverse order Download JS console Up Top Select all Deselect all Preset help %1$s (%2$s) Add tags for %1$s Value when and Add restriction Add simple condition Add expression Add opening hours Conditional restriction %1$s, … Load Area Choose radius: 300m¨ %1$dm Last known location: Current location: Unknown Last known location: %1$s Current location: %1$s \nLat %1$4g, Lon %2$4g\n%3$s %4$s ago Accuracy %1$2.0f meter, From map (coming soon) From coordinates: Lat: Lon: Search: Load Go to map Erroneous input! Please insert decimal formatted coordinates (e.g. "52.333572","8.741185"). Lat. has to lay between -85.0 and +85.0, and Lon. has to lay between -175.0 and +175.0. Move Edit New Preferences Find Help View Erase node Position Split Extract node Append Create relation Edit relation Add member Select members Edit tags Add note EasyEdit Camera Positioning… Show location Follow location Go to current location Start GPX track Pause GPX tracking Clear GPX track and its waypoints GPX track management… Upload GPX track Export GPX track Import GPX track Go to start of GPX track Go to first waypoint Auto download Transfer… Download current view Add current view to download Download at other location Upload data to OSM server Close current changeset File… Export changes to OSC file Read from JOSM file… Save to JOSM file… Notes/bugs… Download bugs for current view Upload all Upload all bugs Clear Clear bugs Auto download bugs Save all notes… Save new and changed notes… Load custom tasks… Save open custom tasks… Save as file Join Unjoin Copy Cut Paste Paste tags Paste from clipboard "Zoom to selection" Rotate Orthogonalise Arrange in circle Split in to polygons New node at positioning system pos. Extend selection Info Voice commands Set name Unknown element (no preset found) Tools… More imagery tools Add imagery from OAM Flush all tile caches Background properties Update imagery layer configuration Zoom to background layer extent Clear clipboard Simple mode Provide feedback Privacy Align background Reset Zero From database From device Save to database Save to device Apply (all zoom levels) %1$d - %2$d %1$.2f meter %1$.3f km Layers… Load GeoJSON layer Add background imagery layer Add overlay imagery layer Add task layer Add grid Add photo layer Configure… Apply stored offset to imagery Contrast Reset OAuth Authorise OAuth Tag filter Preset filter Include way nodes Invert filters Properties History Join Reverse This way is unreversible due to being tagged with directionally dependent attributes. Reversing it would break the tagging. Reverse anyway You are about to delete a way.\n\nYou can either keep all nodes, or delete those that only belong to this way and are tagless. You are about to delete a way that is a member of one or more relations. Removing any way carrying such relations may render it invalid. The way contains nodes outside of the downloaded area and cannot be deleted without creating an inconsistent state. Download all of it before trying again. Only delete way Delete way You are about to delete a node that is a member of one or more relations. Removing any node carrying such relations may render it invalid. Delete node Split all ways Deleting the note cannot be undone! Delete note Way selected Node selected Relation selected Creating path Multiselect New Note selected Split closed way, 1st node Split closed way, 2nd node Add turn restriction Re-select \"from\" segment Add \"via\" segment/element Re-select \"via\" segment Add \"to\" segment Re-select \"to\" segment 1 object %1$d objects Rotate way Add node Tap the screen position Add tagged node Add way Tap the screen position Add map note Tap the screen position Paste object Tap the screen position Paste multiple times Tap the screen position Map background The tile based map background. Map overlay The tile based map overlay. Custom layers Configure layers not in the default configuration. Scale display Type of scale displayed on the map. Data style Choose the style for the data layer. Display bugs and notes Display, edit and create notes/errors. Enable photo layer Display geo-referenced photos. Keep screen on Prevent screen from turning off to save power. Large node drag area Provide large area for dragging nodes. Advanced preferences More settings… Presets Add and enable JOSM compatible presets Built-in preset Validator settings Configure the validation rules. Heroic authors and libre licenses Debug About User interface settings Layout and display configuration options. Show node icons Show the icon of the best-matching preset above nodes. Show POI icons on buildings Show the icon of best-matching preset above buildings. Display tag form Display tag form for editing. Show camera action Show camera icon on action bar. Follow positional device button layout Where the "follow positional device" button will be positioned. Always dim non-downloaded areas Dims non-downloaded areas in locked mode. Fullscreen mode Behaviour on devices with "soft" keys. Show tolerance Displays area where an element can be selected. Use ← key to undo Use the ← key to undo in main edit view. Light theme Largely white iconography sporting white backgrounds. Enable split action bar Allow split action bar, use is device specific. Requires starting Vespucci again, and Android 4.0 or later. Max. number of inline values Maximum number of inline values displayed in tag form. %1$d Values Time to wait before auto-locking Amount of seconds to wait before auto-locking, 0 turns it off. %1$d s Enable anti-aliasing Makes the lines smoother. Max line width Do not draw a way thicker than this. %1$d px Data and edit settings Auto-download, saving and notification settings. Always use contextual menu Always show the contextual menu if a selection is ambiguous. Address tags Tags used for address prediction. Enable name suggestions Turn on suggestions for the name tag. Enable name suggestion presets Automatically add preset when name suggestion is selected. Generate notifications Generate notifications for data with problems or notes Group alerts only Only generate alerts (audio) for groups of notifications once Max. number of displayed notifications Maximum number of displayed notifications per type (min. 1). %1$d Notifications Max distance for notifications The farthest distance a problem or note can be from the current position to generate a notification. %1$d meter(s) Download radius Radius (m) of externally triggered downloads, 0 centers only on map. %1$d meter(s) Maximum auto-download speed Limit (in km/h) above which auto-download is suspended. %1$d km/h Filter for notes/bugs Select which elements are displayed on the notes/bug layer. Notes/bugs download radius Radius (m) of note/bug downloads. Maximum note/bug auto-download speed Limit (in km/h) above which notes/bugs auto-download is suspended. Close changesets Close changesets by default upon saving. Enable auto-preset generation Allow generation of presets from taginfo. Location Settings Positioning parameters and other location providers. Positioning source Source of position location updates. NMEA network source Address of TCP NMEA source as host:port. Minimum positioning interval The minimum time interval for position location notifications, in milliseconds. Lower values drain more battery. %1$d ms Minimum positioning-distance The minimum distance interval for positioning notifications, in meters (float). Lower values drain more battery. %1$d meter(s) Leave positioning turned off Don\'t ask to turn positioning on if off. Fallback to network location If no positioning is present or turned on, fall back to network provider. Server settings OSM API and configuration of other servers. OSM API URL You can set a non-standard API URL here. Should usually not be changed! User account You only need configuration to upload OSM data if not using OAuth. Get an account at https://www.openstreetmap.org/user/new Offset server URL for the image offset server. OSMOSE server URL for the OSMOSE server. Configure geocoders Add, edit, delete geocoders for the search functionality. Layer download and storage Tile-based background imagery download and storage. Max. number of download threads Maximum number of threads for downloading tiles. %1$d Threads Tile cache size Total storage used for caching tiles, in MB. %1$d MB Miscellaneous Report app crashes Crash reporting turned on Crash reporting turned off Show stats Displays data stats and FPS in the lower left corner. Experimental Enable JS console Make the JS console available in "live" mode. Enable voice commands Enable voice command support. Manage APIs API URL Use OAuth Enable OAuth OSM username OSM password Do not mistake it for the wiki password. Remember: It is stored and transmitted in plaintext! Manage presets Use translations Manage geocoders Update preset Preset downloaded Could not download preset file. The preset will not work. The preset file is invalid. The preset will not work. Preset file downloaded. However, some missing icons were not. Preset downloader "%1$s" deleted "%1$s" changed "%1$s" created Upload changes Upload this change? Upload these %1$d changes? Changes Add preset This preset already exists Preset downloaded. An API with this URL already exists. However, you may add another one (e.g. to switch accounts easily). The preset used by the API is not available. Add it first. API installed. Add API The configuration URL does not contain valid data. Add geocoder Add Edit Delete Name URL Default Regular expression State No entries API name API URL Read-only API URL (optional) Notes API URL (optional) Geocoder type Preset API Undo Redo nothing to undo Vespucci background service Background service active Recording a GPS track or auto-downloading Vespucci is recording a GPX track or auto-downloading. To completly exit press the button below or the back button in the app. Failed to enable GPS Address %1$s Address %1$s %2$s Node repositioning Way repositioning Object repositioning Insertion Appendment Node deletion Way deletion Object deletion Splitting of ways Splitting of way Way merging Way reversal Tagging Joining Way separation Relational creation Relational deletion Update of relation Cuting Pasting Way rotatation Way orthogonaligisation Circlular arrangment Conflict resolution Node extraction Vespucci crashed or encountered a serious issue the last time it ran.\n\nPlease help by clicking by \'OK\' to send an error report.\n Add any further info you believe might help and (optionally,) your e-mail address if you want feedback.\n\nThank you. Reported. Could not send report. This operation would create a way with too many nodes. OSM data issue detected Nearby OSM note detected Nearby OSM bug detected in %1$d m %2$s NE ↗ E → SE ↘ S ↓ SW ↙ W ← NW ↖ N ↑ Role Role Member of relation Relation Relations Position Type Object You are about to delete a relation that is a member of one or more relations. Removing any such relation from such relations may render it invalid. Delete relation You are about to delete this element from a relation. Unset relation type days hours minutes seconds km meter No help here. private public trackable identifiable Internal Internal NMEA NMEA from TCP client NMEA from TCP server Open Closed False positive Open Closed Open Closed False positive Skipped Deleted Already fixed Too hard Left Right None LEFT RIGHT NONE @string/follow_GPS_left @string/follow_GPS_right @string/follow_GPS_none Auto Never Force No statusbar AUTO NEVER FORCE NOSTATUSBAR @string/full_screen_auto @string/full_screen_never @string/full_screen_force @string/full_screen_no_statusbar Never Force No statusbar @string/full_screen_never @string/full_screen_force @string/full_screen_no_statusbar – + All Nodes Ways Ways+ Relations Relations+ * node way way+ relation relation+
